title: North-West Coastal Highway
brief_description: Shows how the Main Roads Department of Western Australia is completing a modern road from Carnarvon to Port Hedland as part of the National Highway number 1 encircling the continent. Explains some aspects of its effect on the development and prosperity of the area.
